metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2819 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The texSubImage2D implementation in the WebGL subsystem in Google Chrome before 20.0.1132.43 does not properly handle uploads to floating-point textures, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted web page, as demonstrated by certain WebGL performance tests, aka rdar problem 11520387.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 20.0.1132.47~r144678-0ubuntu5
chromium-browser-l10n - 20.0.1132.47~r144678-0ubuntu5
chromium-chromedriver - 20.0.1132.47~r144678-0ubuntu5
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 20.0.1132.47~r144678-0ubuntu5
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 20.0.1132.47~r144678-0ubuntu5
No subscription required

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-1.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-3.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-1.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-3.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-3.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-bin - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-3.0-25 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-1.0-common - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-3.0-common - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20.0.1132.47~r144678-0ubuntu5').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
webkitgtk package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1').
